info.title: Aryventory Sales Management API
info.description: API for managing sales executives, leads, meetings, shifts, and business operations

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive dashboard overview with shift counts, revenue metrics, and performance data
Retrieve shift locations for map display with GPS coordinates
Get detailed revenue breakdown by executive, manager, region, or daily
Get detailed user performance metrics with daily breakdown
Retrieve a paginated list of leads with filtering options

parameters.name: shop_name
parameters.description: Filter by shop name, contact person, email, or mobile number

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter by creation date range start (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter by creation date range end (YYYY-MM-DD)

post.description: Create a new lead with all required information

assigned_to.description: User ID to assign the lead to

shop_name: The shop name field is required.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific lead including all related data

put.description: Update an existing lead with new information

assigned_to.description: User ID to assign the lead to

shop_name: The shop name field is required.

lead_ids.description: Array of lead IDs to delete

lead_ids: The lead ids field is required.

get.description: Retrieve dropdown options for lead form (business types, current systems, lead statuses, users)
Export leads to CSV file with all applied filters

parameters.name: shop_name
parameters.description: Filter by shop name, contact person, email, or mobile number

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter by creation date range start (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter by creation date range end (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.description: Retrieve all meetings with related data

post.description: Create a new meeting for a lead

lead_id: The lead id field is required.

post.description: Start a meeting with selfie and location tracking

lead_id: The lead id field is required.

post.description: End a meeting with selfie and location tracking

meeting_id: The meeting id field is required.

get.description: Retrieve all leads assigned to the logged-in sales executive
Get lead counts grouped by status for the logged-in sales executive

200.description: Lead counts by status retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieve all shifts for the authenticated user with pagination and filtering

post.description: Start a new shift for the authenticated user

400.description: Bad Request - Shift already started or validation failed

post.description: End the current shift for the authenticated user
Start a break for the current shift

400.description: Bad Request - No shift started or break already in progress
Bad Request - No active break to end

get.description: Get current shift status and timers for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get detailed user shifts with meeting information
get.description: Retrieve detailed shift information including meetings, time between meetings, and distances
Retrieve a paginated list of users with filtering options

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by name, email, phone, or designation

get.description: Retrieve user preferences for the authenticated user

put.description: Update user preferences for the authenticated user

Lead.title: Lead
Lead.description: Lead model representing a potential customer

created_by.description: User ID who created the lead

assigned_to.description: User ID assigned to the lead

last_updated_by.description: User ID who last updated the lead

UserBreak.title: User Break
UserBreak.description: User break model for tracking individual breaks during shifts
